item.title: 交易员密切关注图表以寻找股市暴跌可能止步的迹象
item.description: 科技股抛售潮持续发酵，标普500指数徘徊于关键技术趋势线附近，交易员们正仔细研究图表，试图判断该股指基准还有多大下跌空间。【原文：A snowballing tech stock selloff has the S&P 500 Index hovering near a key technical trend line, with traders poring over charts to determine how much further the equity benchmark might fall.】

item.title: Palantir在曼哈顿寻求办公空间，以实现全市范围的扩张
item.description: Palantir Technologies Inc.正在曼哈顿寻求更多办公空间，加入了众多在纽约市扩张的科技公司行列。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. is seeking more office capacity in Manhattan, joining a slew of tech firms expanding across New York City.】

item.title: 鲍勃折扣家具公司IPO募资3.31亿美元后股价大涨11%
item.description: 由贝恩资本支持的家居零售商鲍勃折扣家具公司周四在美股首次公开募股中筹集3.31亿美元后，其股票在首日交易中一度大涨11%。【原文：Bob’s Discount Furniture Inc., a home furnishings retailer backed by Bain Capital, jumped as much as 11% in its trading debut Thursday, after the company raised $331 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 华尔街交易员预测比特币图表将跌至何种程度
item.description: 许多看涨比特币的论调突然同时崩塌。【原文：Many of the bullish Bitcoin narratives are suddenly breaking down all at once.】

item.title: 白银波动率攀升，杠杆ETF成焦点
item.description: 白银价格的波动性因杠杆交易所交易产品的日益普及而加剧，使其价格波动比以往任何时候都更为剧烈。【原文：Silver’s volatility has been amplified by the growing popularity of leveraged exchange-traded products, making its price swings more violent than ever.】

item.title: Anthropic发布新模型，擅长金融研究
item.description: Anthropic公司正推出其最强大的人工智能模型的新版本，该模型专为执行金融研究而设计。此前该公司进军法律服务领域，导致传统软件制造商的股价大幅波动。【原文：Anthropic is releasing a new version of its most powerful AI model that’s designed to carry out financial research, days after the company’s push into legal services upended the stocks of legacy software makers.】

item.title: Tether向加密银行Anchorage Digital投资1亿美元
item.description: Tether Holdings SA向Anchorage Digital Bank NA投资1亿美元，使这家联邦特许加密银行的估值升至42亿美元。【原文：Tether Holdings SA invested $100 million in Anchorage Digital Bank NA, boosting the federally charted crypto bank’s valuation to $4.2 billion.】

item.title: 沙特下调亚洲买家关键油价，显示供应过剩
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯将亚洲买家主要原油等级的价格下调至数年来的最低水平，这进一步表明全球供应正超过需求。【原文：Saudi Arabia dropped the price of its main oil grade for buyers in Asia to the lowest in years, a further sign that global supplies are running ahead of demand.】

item.title: 麦克莱姆警告勿以降息抵消结构性变化
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫·麦克勒姆警告称，在经济适应结构性变革期间降息，可能助长未来通胀风险。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem warned that cutting interest rates while the economy is adapting to structural changes risks stoking future inflation.】

item.title: 拖拉机制造商爱科集团预计今年起农业市场将迎来迟来的复苏
item.description: 全球最大的农业设备制造商之一爱科集团预测，2026年其销售额将实现三年来首次增长，这表明农业领域期待已久的复苏似乎已近在眼前。【原文：A long-awaited recovery in the farm sector appears to be in sight as AGCO Corp., one of the world’s biggest agriculture equipment makers, is predicting an increase in sales for the first time in three years in 2026.】

item.title: 英格兰银行为彻底消灭通胀而冒险冲击就业市场
item.description: 英格兰银行认为已控制住英国的通胀问题。如今它却面临就业危机的风险。【原文：The Bank of England believes it has got on top of Britain’s inflation problem. Now it runs the risk of a jobs crisis.】

item.title: 萨巴德尔任命阿门戈尔为首席执行官，冈萨雷斯-布埃诺卸任
item.description: 萨瓦德尔银行首席执行官塞萨尔·冈萨雷斯-布埃诺突然宣布离职，此前仅数月他刚带领该银行成功抵御了竞争对手BBVA发起的敌意收购。【原文：Banco Sabadell SA Chief Executive Officer César González-Bueno is leaving in a surprise move just a few months after he led the lender’s successful defense against a hostile bid from rival BBVA SA.】

item.title: 倍耐力董事会否决网络轮胎业务分拆计划
item.description: 倍耐力公司董事会周四在董事会议上否决了其最大股东提出的将网络轮胎业务分拆的提案，该公司声明证实了此前彭博新闻的报道。【原文：Pirelli & C. SpA’s board rejected a proposal by its largest shareholder to spin off its Cyber Tyre activities at a directors’ meeting on Thursday, according to a statement confirming an earlier Bloomberg News report.】

item.title: 卡尔希下载量在超级碗前夕远超博彩应用
item.description: 就在数月之前，卡尔希公司还远远落后于FanDuel和DraftKings——这两家美国体育博彩领域的霸主企业。【原文：Just months ago, Kalshi Inc. lagged far behind FanDuel and DraftKings — the dominant players in US sports betting.】

item.title: 英格兰银行行长贝利称3月降息概率五五开“并非坏事”
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁·贝利本月维持借贷成本不变的决定意外偏向鸽派，此举似乎印证了市场对3月降息概率达50%的预期。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey appeared to endorse markets betting on a 50% chance of an interest-rate cut in March after a more dovish-than-expected decision to maintain the cost of borrowing this month.】

item.title: 比特币五年表现逊于标普500、纳斯达克100及黄金
item.description: 比特币不再能跑赢大型资产类别。【原文：Bitcoin is no longer beating the big asset classes.】

item.title: 德国保守党考虑对社交媒体设置年龄限制
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希·梅尔茨领导的保守派基督教民主联盟正考虑对16岁以下儿童实施社交媒体禁令，此举源于欧洲各国对数字服务日益严格的监管审查。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz’s conservative Christian Democrats are considering a social media ban for children below the age of 16 amid growing scrutiny of the digital offerings across Europe.】

item.title: 法国就针对星链的间谍案起诉四名涉华间谍
item.description: 法国当局以间谍罪起诉四名涉嫌为中国从事间谍活动的人员，该案涉及埃隆·马斯克旗下的卫星互联网服务商星链。【原文：French authorities charged four people with spying for China in a case that targeted Elon Musk’s satellite Internet provider Starlink.】

item.title: 托克公司正与中国ITG洽谈设立信贷基金事宜
item.description: 据知情人士透露，大宗商品贸易商托克集团正与中国供应链企业厦门ITG集团洽谈，拟成立合资企业为大宗商品交易提供融资服务。【原文：Commodity trading house Trafigura Group is in talks with Chinese supply chain conglomerate Xiamen ITG Group to form a joint venture to finance commodity deals, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拉加德期待人工智能在欧洲释放更多生产力红利
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德表示，欧元区需要时间才能从人工智能相关投资热潮中获得进一步的生产力提升。【原文：The euro zone will need time to see further productivity gains from an AI-related investment boom, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said.】

item.title: 极地寒流引发美国史上最大规模天然气库存消耗
item.description: 上周美国天然气消费者从储气设施中提取的天然气量创历史新高，原因是1月下旬一场强劲风暴推高了取暖燃料需求，同时扰乱了主要产气盆地的天然气生产。【原文：US natural gas consumers withdrew more gas from storage last week than they ever have before as a powerful late-January storm boosted demand for the heating fuel while also disrupting production across key gas-producing basins.】

item.title: 英国领导层剧变，英格兰银行意外举措引发国债与英镑震荡
item.description: 在英国市场因政治风波和英国央行决策者意外接近的投票结果而动荡不安的一天，英镑成为了最薄弱的环节。【原文：On a day when UK markets were buffeted by political drama and a surprisingly close vote from Bank of England policymakers, it was the pound that proved the weakest link.】

item.title: 美国职位空缺降至2020年以来最低水平，裁员人数小幅上升
item.description: 美国12月职位空缺意外降至2020年以来最低水平，同时裁员人数小幅上升，进一步印证劳动力需求疲软的态势。【原文：US job openings unexpectedly fell in December to the lowest level since 2020 and layoffs edged up, adding to evidence of sluggish demand for workers.】

item.title: 英力士债券价格上涨，因欧盟打击竞争对手廉价进口产品
item.description: 欧洲委员会裁定中国、沙特和美国企业违反共同市场反倾销法规后，化工巨头英力士的债券价格应声上涨。【原文：The bonds of chemicals giant Ineos rose after the European Commission ruled companies in China, Saudi Arabia and the US were breaching anti-dumping regulation in the common market.】

item.title: 美股延续跌势，科技股暴跌已持续三日
item.description: 周四美国股市延续跌势，科技股走低，且私营部门就业数据重燃经济放缓担忧。【原文：US stocks continued to slide on Thursday as technology shares fell and private jobs data revived worries of an economic slowdown.】

item.title: 皇帝娱乐出售黄金储备获巨额收益
item.description: 帝皇娱乐酒店有限公司发现，黄金砖块的用途比装饰其澳门物业的豪华大堂更有利可图。【原文：Emperor Entertainment Hotel Ltd. found a more profitable use for gold bricks than decorating the sumptuous lobby of its Macau property.】

item.title: 津巴布韦寻求合作伙伴开发价值5亿美元的铂金矿
item.description: 津巴布韦国有企业穆塔帕铂金集团表示，已联系其他矿商协助开发该国一座价值5亿美元的矿山。【原文：Zimbabwe’s state-owned Mutapa Platinum Group said it has approached other miners to help it develop a $500 million mine in the country.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德将向欧盟领导人提交加强欧盟的清单
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德承诺，将在即将召开的欧盟峰会上确保各国政府首脑审议一系列强化欧盟长期韧性的措施。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde vowed to ensure EU heads of government consider a whole list of measures to strengthen the bloc’s long-term resilience before their upcoming summit.】

item.title: 高盛为杜邦子公司交易筹备37.5亿美元债务发行
item.description: 高盛集团正筹备一项修订后的37.5亿美元融资方案——该方案现可能包含垃圾债券发行——以支持化工企业Arclin收购杜邦公司的芳纶业务。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is readying a revised $3.75 billion financing — now likely to include a junk bond offering — to support chemical maker Arclin Inc.’s acquisition of DuPont de Nemours Inc.’s Aramids business.】
